doctor.name: Dr Mohammad Harun Ur Rashid
doctor.specialty: Neurosurgery (Brain, Nerve, Spine & Stroke Surgery) Specialist
doctor.info: Dr Mohammad Harun Ur Rashid is a Neurosurgeon in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Neurosurgery). He is a Associate Professor & Head, Neurosurgery at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr Mohammad Harun Ur Rashid at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh is 4pm to 9pm (Thursday) & 10am to 4pm (Friday).
